page.title: 06SCHOOL LOG BOOK 1939-1945
page.content: On January 6th 1939 7 evacuees left and 12 admitted.The school then had 62 pupils on the book.On the 13th 4 more evacuees came to the school.On January 19th part 1 of the eleven plus took place.One girl named"XXXXXXXXX" was not medically fit to take part 2.On the 22nd of the month there were 33 evacuees present.On January 25th heavy snow stopped people coming to school and those who turned up were sent back home because of freezing temperatures. On the 27th a store was fitted into the main room.On February 10th some seniors broke the school house window.On March 6th part 2 of the eleven plus took place.On July 21st there was an outing to Southsea.On September 8th school re-opened and Downton admitted the 4 children that took the examination.On September 11th 4 more evacuees came.
